snippet: Even after the Stuxnet computer worm became public, President Obama accelerated cyberattacks against Iran that had begun in the Bush administration, temporarily disabling 1,000 centrifuges.
abstract: Pres Obama secretly ordered increasingly sophisticated attacks on the computer systems that run Iran’s main nuclear enrichment facilities, significantly expanding America’s first sustained use of cyberweapons; he decided to accelerate the attacks begun in the Bush administration and code-named Olympic Games even after an element of the program Stuxnet accidentally became public in the summer of 2010; government has only recently admitted developing cyberweapons and has never admitted using them.
lead_paragraph: Even after the Stuxnet computer worm became public, President Obama accelerated cyberattacks against Iran that had begun in the Bush administration, temporarily disabling 1,000 centrifuges.

headline.seo: Obama Ordered Wave of Cyberattacks Against Iran
headline.main: Obama Order Sped Up Wave of Cyberattacks Against Iran
headline.print_headline: Obama Order Sped Up Wave Of Cyberattacks Against Iran
